summary:
Spider-Man is a popular superhero from Marvel Comics, created by Stan Lee and Steve Ditko. He first appeared in 1962 and has since starred in many comics, TV shows, movies, and games. Spider-Man's secret identity is Peter Parker, a high school student who gains spider-like powers after a radioactive spider bite. He uses these powers to fight crime, inspired by a lesson from his late Uncle Ben: "With great power comes great responsibility."

Spider-Man has had various comic book series, including *The Amazing Spider-Man*, and has been a part of superhero teams like the Avengers. The character has been adapted into live-action films, with actors like Tobey Maguire, Andrew Garfield, and Tom Holland portraying him.
title: Spider-Man
